```py
>>> import time
>>> from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx
>>> 
>>> E5 = 659
>>> C5 = 523
>>> G5 = 784
>>> 
>>> def play_note(note, duration=0.15):
...     if note == 0:
...         time.sleep(duration)
...     else:
...         cpx.play_tone(note, duration)
... 
>>> play_note(E5)
```

```py
>>> play_note(0)
```

```py
>>> MELODY = (E5, E5, 0, E5, 0, C5, E5, 0, G5)
>>> for note in MELODY:
...     play_note(note)
... 
>>> 
```

```py
import time
from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx

E5 = 659
C5 = 523
G5 = 784

MELODY = (E5, E5, 0, E5, 0, C5, E5, 0, G5)

def play_note(note, duration=0.15):
    if note == 0:
        time.sleep(duration)
    else:
        cpx.play_tone(note, duration)

for note in MELODY:
    play_note(note)
```

```py
from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx

BEEP_HIGH = 960
BEEP_LOW = 800

for i in range(3):
    cpx.play_tone(BEEP_HIGH, 0.5)
    cpx.play_tone(BEEP_LOW, 0.5)
```

```py
>>> from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx
>>> import time
>>> 
>>> BEEP_HIGH = 960
>>> BEEP_LOW = 800
>>> 
>>> cpx.pixels.brightness = 0.10
>>> cpx.start_tone(BEEP_HIGH)
>>> time.sleep(0.5)
>>> cpx.stop_tone()
```

```py
>>> cpx.start_tone(BEEP_HIGH)
>>> for i in range(10):
...     cpx.pixels[i] = 0xFF0000
...     time.sleep(0.1)
... 
>>> cpx.stop_tone()
>>> 
```

```py
>>> cpx.start_tone(BEEP_LOW)
>>> for i in range(10):
...     cpx.pixels[i] = 0x000000
...     time.sleep(0.1)
... 
>>> cpx.stop_tone()
>>> 
```

```py
from adafruit_circuitplayground.express import cpx
import time

BEEP_HIGH = 960
BEEP_LOW = 800

cpx.pixels.brightness = 0.10

cpx.start_tone(BEEP_HIGH)
for i in range(10):
    cpx.pixels[i] = 0xFF0000
    time.sleep(0.1)
cpx.stop_tone()

cpx.start_tone(BEEP_LOW)
for i in range(10):
    cpx.pixels[i] = 0x000000
    time.sleep(0.1)
cpx.stop_tone()
```
